content: STI ETF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Oct 2018S&P 500 ETF (VOO) has dipped recently, but price level is still near historic peak. Good time to buy? Or with DCA does it not matter ?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 31 Oct 2018With Dollar Cost Averaging, it doesn't matter since time in the market is better than timing the market. You'll buy more units when prices are low(er) like now, and lesser units when prices are high(er). If you believe that the market or ETF will eventually rise and grow in the future, DCA.0 comments0
